TopicTitle: Kerbals can move before surface sample animation is finished

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 6800H with Radeon Graphics | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti Laptop | RAM: 40 GB

 

If you get a Kerbal out of a vessel, and select: "Run Surface Sample," wait 4 seconds and then try to move with WASD, the Kerbal will move around while performing the sample.

No video

Reproducible

Frequency: Very High

Edited December 24, 2023 by The Space Peacock
